text: Ms Teo is patient and dedicated in her teaching. We have seen how much our boys have grown under her guidance. She takes time to work on their techniques and explains the music pieces thoroughly to help my boys understand them better. She also gives updates on their progress regularly. Most importantly, my boys enjoy learning piano from her! We are so thankful to have Ms Teo as our boys' piano teacher! :)

Ms Teo is a caring and patient teacher. She has a structured plan for her students and always make sure they are right on track. My child has been with her for only 3mths and I could already see a great improvement in her technical skill. My child enjoys attending piano lesson with Ms Teo and we are just so thankful that we found her.
Ms. Teo Sue Ying is a wonderful teacher and teaches in a very thorough manner. My daughter learned many of the finer aspects of playing the piano in her lessons.
Thank you Ms Teo for teaching me and my son piano! Thank you for your thoughtful guidance and support to help us making progress and enjoy our learning!
Ms. Sue is a very knowledgeable, patient and persistent teacher that helped me to achieved a distinction on my grade 5 ABRSM exam!
